titleStmt.title: By the King. A second proclamation for the apprehension of Richard Smith, a popish priest, stiled, and calling himselfe, the Bishop of Calcedon.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... VVhitehall, the foure and twentieth day of March, in the fourth yeere of our reigne ... .
The date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 13; Steele notation: the where 2) assi- appre-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
